summary: Successfully tested Comments tab functionality in EnhancedTaskDetailModal after React hooks fix. The Comments tab is working correctly without any React hooks violations or blank screen issues.

configuration_issues.description: API calls using HTTP instead of HTTPS causing fetch failures
configuration_issues.impact: API calls fail but doesn't affect UI functionality

resolved_issues.issue: React hooks violation - 'Rendered fewer hooks than expected'
resolved_issues.description: Main agent successfully fixed React hooks violation by restructuring early return pattern

passed_tests: Comments tab is accessible and clickable
Comments tab displays full content (header, statistics, search, add comment form)
No React hooks errors in console
Success message displays after comment submission
All other tabs (Overview, Details, Time Tracking, Activity, Dependencies) work correctly
No blank screen in Comments tab
